name: tmuxify
description: Firefox extension for tmux-like tab navigation

scripts.build: npm run clean && tsc && npm run copy-assets
scripts.copy-assets: mkdir -p dist/popup dist/icons && cp src/manifest.json dist/ && cp src/icons/* dist/icons/ && cp src/popup/popup.html dist/popup/ 2>/dev/null || true
scripts.dev: npm run build && npm run web-ext:run
